thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Kotoko win race on rivals Hearts to secure the signing of free-agent Ernest Sowah
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Kotoko win race on rivals Hearts to secure the signing of free-agent Ernest Sowah

title: EXCLUSIVE: Kotoko win race on rivals Hearts to secure the signing of free-agent Ernest Sowah
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 18:55 CET EXCLUSIVE: Kotoko win race on rivals Hearts to secure the signing of free-agent Ernest Sowah - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Sowah, who is a free agent following the expiration of his contract with Congolese club Don Bosco was also wanted at Hearts of Oak to serve as a viable alternative for Burkina Faso international Abdoulaye Soulama. 
Details of the former Berekum Chelsea goalkeeper's move to Kotoko remain concealed as the club is yet to make an official announcement of their new signing. 
But sources suggest the Black Stars goalkeeper has signed a three-year contract with the dethroned Premier League champions. 
More to followâ€¦
